channel.title: How do i make it so its says "system update in 00:30"?
channel.description:
Title says most, so i want to know how to make it say "system update in 00:30" then counts down, and when it goes to 00:00 it logs every one out and shuts the server down.
I've seen this on Trickyscape.no-ip.info server and i really like it! ;D

item.title: How do i make it so its says "system update in 00:30"?

item.title: How do i make it so its says "system update in 00:30"?
item.dc:creator: @Zachary825 Zachary825
item.description:
@Zachary825 wrote:

if you owner, type ::update HOW LONG like ::update 30(30 secs)

Read full topic
